description: Custom image analyzer for KB article screenshots and UI diagrams

Description.description: A detailed description of the screenshot or UI image, focusing on: what screen/page is shown, key UI elements visible, any highlighted or annotated areas, navigation steps illustrated, and any text visible in the image.

UIElements.description: List of key UI elements visible in the image (buttons, menus, fields, labels)

NavigationPath.description: The navigation path shown in the image, e.g. 'Settings > Security > Manage user security'
